title: ARISE: A Multi-Task Weak Supervision Framework for Network Measurements
venue: IEEE Journal on Selected Areas in Communications
excerpt: A weakly-supervised multi-task learning framework for Internet traffic classification.
citation: J. Knofczynski, R. Durairajan, and W. Willinger, "ARISE: A Multi-Task Weak Supervision Framework for Network Measurements," in IEEE Journal on Selected Areas in Communcations, vol. 40, no. 7, July 2022.

title: Combating COVID on College Campuses: The Impact of Structural Changes on Viral Transmissions
excerpt: A computational modeling simulation of airborne pathogen transmission in academic spaces demonstrating the importance of ventilation and social distancing in scholastic settings.
citation: J. Knofczynski, A. Killebrew Bruehl, B. Warner, and R. Shelton, Combating COVID on College Campuses: The Impact of Structural Changes on Viral Transmissions," Portland State University Teuscher Labs, August 2020."
